statements: SELECT * FROM Transportation_Options WHERE option_type='Bus';
SELECT option_id, option_name, price FROM Transportation_Options WHERE available_seats > 50 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT option_name, option_type, price FROM Transportation_Options WHERE price < 100 ORDER BY option_name;
SELECT * FROM Transportation_Options WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY available_seats ASC;
SELECT option_type, SUM(available_seats) AS total_seats FROM Transportation_Options GROUP BY option_type HAVING total_seats > 100;
SELECT option_name, price FROM Transportation_Options WHERE available_seats > 20 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT option_type, price FROM Transportation_Options WHERE available_seats <= 10 ORDER BY option_type ASC, price DESC;
SELECT option_id, option_name, price FROM Transportation_Options WHERE price BETWEEN 50.00 AND 100.00 ORDER BY option_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Transportation_Options WHERE option_type = 'Bus' OR option_type = 'Train' ORDER BY option_id;
SELECT option_id, option_name, available_seats, price FROM Transportation_Options WHERE available_seats > 15 AND price < 75.00 ORDER BY option_id ASC, price DESC;
SELECT * FROM Train WHERE departure_city = 'New York';
SELECT train_name, arrival_city FROM Train WHERE train_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT train_id, departure_city, arrival_city FROM Train WHERE arrival_city = 'Los Angeles' AND departure_city = 'Chicago';
SELECT * FROM Bus WHERE origin_city = 'Miami' ORDER BY bus_id DESC;
SELECT bus_name, destination_city FROM Bus WHERE destination_city = 'Seattle';
SELECT train_id, train_name, departure_city, arrival_city FROM Train WHERE train_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM Train WHERE departure_city = 'New York' ORDER BY train_name DESC;
SELECT bus_name, origin_city, destination_city FROM Bus WHERE origin_city = 'London' AND destination_city = 'Paris';
SELECT train_id, train_name, departure_city FROM Train WHERE departure_city = 'Chicago' OR arrival_city = 'Seattle';
SELECT bus_id, bus_name FROM Bus WHERE origin_city LIKE '%on%' ORDER BY bus_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM trains;
SELECT train_name, departure_station, arrival_station FROM trains WHERE departure_time > '12:00:00';
SELECT train_id, train_name, departure_station, arrival_station FROM trains WHERE arrival_station = 'New York';
SELECT train_id, train_name, departure_time, arrival_time FROM trains WHERE departure_station = 'Chicago' ORDER BY departure_time DESC;
SELECT car_model, rental_location, return_location, rental_price FROM rental_cars WHERE rental_price < 100.00 ORDER BY rental_price ASC;
SELECT train_name, departure_station, arrival_station FROM trains WHERE departure_time > '10:00:00' AND arrival_time < '15:00:00';
SELECT * FROM buses WHERE departure_city = 'New York' OR arrival_city = 'Los Angeles';
SELECT car_model, rental_location, return_location, rental_price FROM rental_cars WHERE rental_price > 1000.00 ORDER BY rental_price DESC;
SELECT bus_name, departure_city, departure_time FROM buses WHERE departure_city = 'San Francisco' ORDER BY departure_time;
SELECT train_name, arrival_station, arrival_time FROM trains WHERE train_name LIKE '%Express%' OR arrival_station = 'Chicago';
SELECT * FROM trains;
SELECT train_name,origin,destination FROM trains WHERE departure_time > '08:00:00';
SELECT train_id,train_name,arrival_time FROM trains WHERE destination='New York';
SELECT train_name,departure_time FROM trains WHERE arrival_time < '15:00:00';
SELECT * FROM buses WHERE origin='Los Angeles' AND destination='San Francisco';
SELECT * FROM trains WHERE train_name = 'Express Train'
SELECT train_name, departure_time, arrival_time FROM trains WHERE departure_time > '10:00:00' ORDER BY arrival_time DESC
SELECT train_name, origin, destination FROM trains WHERE origin = 'City A' OR destination = 'City B'
SELECT train_id, train_name, departure_time, arrival_time, origin, destination FROM trains WHERE departure_time BETWEEN '08:00:00' AND '12:00:00' ORDER BY train_name ASC
SELECT * FROM rental_cars WHERE manufacturer = 'Toyota'
SELECT * FROM Trains;
SELECT train_name, departure_station, arrival_station FROM Trains WHERE departure_time > '07:00:00';
SELECT train_name, arrival_time FROM Trains WHERE departure_station = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM Buses WHERE origin_city = 'Los Angeles' AND destination_city = 'San Francisco';
SELECT bus_name, arrival_time FROM Buses WHERE departure_time < '10:00:00';
SELECT * FROM Trains WHERE departure_station = 'New York' AND arrival_station = 'Los Angeles';
SELECT train_name, departure_time, arrival_time FROM Trains WHERE departure_time < '12:00:00';
SELECT train_id, train_name, departure_station, arrival_station FROM Trains ORDER BY train_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Buses WHERE origin_city = 'Chicago' AND destination_city = 'Miami' ORDER BY arrival_time ASC;
SELECT car_model, rental_agency, rental_cost FROM RentalCars WHERE rental_cost > 1000.00;
